name: Horn - CSB
description: Cinematic Studio Brass French Horn. Warm, noble tone with rich overtones. Versatile for both heroic themes and soft romantic passages.

legato.description: Legato is for MONO parts only - smooth transition between single notes. Enable legato (velocity ≥64) when playing single melodic lines. Disable legato (velocity <64) when 2+ notes sound simultaneously. Re-enable when returning to mono. Prefer keyswitch over CC for legato control.

ai.system_prompt_template: Generate French horn parts for Cinematic Studio Brass. Use CC1 for dynamics on long articulations, velocity for short articulations. LEGATO: Keyswitch Ab1 toggles legato (velocity ≥64 on, <64 off). IMPORTANT: Legato is for MONO parts only - use it for smooth note-to-note transitions in single melodic lines. Disable legato before any polyphonic passages (2+ simultaneous notes), re-enable when returning to mono melody. Switch articulations via CC58. Playable range B1-F5, preferred F2-C5.
